name: Name
qa_title_1: What is the difference in buying Apple products at I-Tech?
qa_title_2: Why are genuine products more expensive than parallel imports sold at other stores?
qa_title_3: What benefits and promotions can I get when buying at I-Tech?
qa_title_4: What customer care services does I-Tech provide?
qa_title_5: Does I-Tech offer home delivery? Does the quality change?
qa_content_1: - I-Tech is an authorized retailer of genuine Apple products in Vietnam. I-Tech only sells one type of product: genuine Apple products.
qa_content_2: - Genuine products are quality-assured by the Ministry of Information and Communications, ensuring that they are 100% authentic and have clear origins.
qa_content_3: - Parallel imports, although cheaper, do not guarantee quality. They lack the certification labels from the Ministry of Information and Communications as well as the importation labels (from I-Tech). The components used in these devices are often low-quality components purchased in large quantities from China. The stores then manually assemble these components to create a final product for sale to consumers.
qa_content_4: - Depending on the timing, there will be different promotions available. I-Tech commits to providing you with the best promotions and customer care services.
qa_content_5: - To learn about the current promotions, please call our hotline for assistance.
qa_content_6: - Products that have hardware defects within the warranty period are eligible for a one-to-one exchange within one month from the date of purchase. From the second to the twelfth month, the products will be covered under Apple's warranty policy.
qa_content_7: - Free installation of applications/games and maintenance during usage.
qa_content_8: - I-Tech provides free nationwide delivery and guarantees delivery within 60 minutes. The products are 100% genuine and sealed when they reach you.
qa_content_9: - You can click the 'Buy Now' button or call the hotline at 1900 31201 for assistance.
